mapper.insert: /* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.ApplypaymentapprmngMapper.confirmApplypayment */ INSERT INTO SETTLEMENTMST ( CO_CODE, CONFIRM_SEQ, SETTLEMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, CONFIRM_AMT, CONFIRM_MILEAGE, CONFIRM_RATE_AMT, CONFIRM_DATE, CONFIRM_IND, TAX_IND, PAY_YM, ATCH_ID, REMARK ) VALUES ( #{loginCoId}, #{confirmSeq}, #{settlementSeq}, #{userId}, CASE WHEN #{confirmAmt} = '' THEN 0 ELSE CAST(#{confirmAmt} AS SIGNED) END, CASE WHEN #{confirmMileage} = '' THEN 0 ELSE CAST(#{confirmMileage} AS SIGNED) END, CASE WHEN #{confirmRateAmt} = '' THEN 0 ELSE CAST(#{confirmRateAmt} AS SIGNED) END, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), 'Y', #{taxInd}, #{payYm}, #{atchId}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: /* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.ApplypaymentapprmngMapper.findSettlement */ SELECT ST.SETTLEMENT_SEQ, ST.USER_ID, ST.CUST_ID, ST.PROD_ID, ST.INCENTIVE_RATE, ST.REFUND_IND, ST.GUBUN, ST.REFUND_SALE_TOTAL_AMT, ST.REFUND_PROD_TOTAL_AMT, ST.REFUND_EXPECT_RATE_AMT, CD.CODE_NAME AS GUBUN_NAME FROM SETTLEMENT ST LEFT JOIN CDBASE CD ON CD.CO_CODE = ST.CO_CODE AND CD.PATTERN_CODE = 'SE02' AND ST.GUBUN = CD.BASE_CODE WHERE ST.CO_CODE = #{loginCoId} AND SETTLEMENT_SEQ = #{settlementSeq}
